div.div:
- N Consumer > Partition: Some consumer will stand by
- N Consumer < Partition: each consumer receive traffic from multiple partition
- N Consumer = Partition: one to one mapping
- Each message will be consumed exact once within each Consumer Group

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
